snippet: A legal battle between the Harlem Wizards and the Harlem Ambassadors, two show basketball teams, centers on accusations that a player was induced to jump from one team to the other.
abstract: Harlem Ambassadors, show basketball team that tours the country playing exhibition games in small arenas, is suing rival show team Harlem Wizards for allegedly inducing LaMarvon Jackson to break his contract with Ambassadors and play for the Wizards; Ambassadors are seeking $73,620 in general contract and punitive damages.
lead_paragraph: A legal battle between the Harlem Wizards and the Harlem Ambassadors, two show basketball teams, centers on accusations that a player was induced to jump from one team to the other.

headline.seo: Basketball’s Harlem Wizards and Ambassadors in a Legal Wrangle
